EmailTemplate.name: CME Case Closed v2
EmailTemplate.subject: Case {!Case.CaseNumber} - {!Case.Subject} - Case Closed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Colleague,
Case Closed â€“ Refer to Comments field in Salesforce for action taken.
Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber}
Subject: {!Case.Subject}
Please do not comment within the case as these comments cannot be seen by the Contract Management team.
Please do not respond to this notification via reply e-mail.
You can review your case details online by following the link below:
{!Case.Link} or entering your case number into the search engine on the front page of SalesForce.com.
Alternatively, you can contact the Sales Support team on 1800SalesSupport@auspost.com.au or 1800 316 508 during business hours.
Regards
Contract Management Team
